content.question: The purpose of the Liberty Loan Campaign illustrated in the drawing above was to

choices.label: encourage young men to enlist in the army
finance American involvement in the First World War
support the establishment of Boy Scout troops throughout the nation
aid in the implementation of New Deal programs
support funding for Franklin Rooseveltâ€™s Lend-Lease program

content.answer: finance American involvement in the First World War

topic.text: 7.5: World War I - Military and Diplomacy

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify  a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience.
